subject: Running a junit from Command Line
msgSnippet: Hi- I am trying to run JUnit from command line. I have a Junit named Junit2 in c: small. The below is how i am running it C: small java
messageBody:
Hi-

I am trying to run JUnit from command line. I have a Junit named
"Junit2" in c:\small. The below is how i am running it

C:\small>java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore Junit2

The following is what i get as output.

JUnit version 4.5
Could not find class: Junit2

Time: 0

OK (0 tests)

Why is that my junit cant be found.
